content.text:
§b§lKocakZ Server
§rWelcome to §b§lKocakZ Server
§r- Tutorial

- How to make Chest Shop?
1. You must have chest
2. You must have Sign
3. Put the Sign in the Chest
Line 1 = Blank (do not write anything)
Line 2 = Number you want to sell per transaction
Line 3 = Price
Line 4= Item ID:meta

§e§lExample

§rLine 1 = (Dont write anything)
Line 2 = 1 --> Per transtaction
Line 3 = 5000 --> Money Sell
Line 4 = 220:1 -> Item ID (At ScoreHUD)

5. And then done

§c§lComing Soon!
